workingHours.title: Working Hours Management
workingHours.description: Configure your business's standard operating hours and special date exceptions.
workingHours.fetchError: Failed to fetch working hours data.

weeklyHours.description: Manage your standard business hours for each day of the week. These hours apply unless overridden by a special date.

specialDates.description: Define exceptions to your weekly schedule, such as holidays or special events. Set custom hours, mark days as closed, and apply price adjustments if needed.

workingHours.weeklyDescription: Set your standard weekly working hours. These hours will be used for client bookings unless overridden by a special date.

priceAdjustment.title: Price Adjustment
priceAdjustment.tooltipInfo: Apply a price modification (increase or decrease) for this specific day or date. This can be a percentage of the original price or a fixed amount.

errors.typeRequired: Adjustment type is required if applying adjustment.
errors.valueRequired: Adjustment value is required if applying adjustment.

specialDate.sectionDescription: Define specific dates with unique working hours or closures, like holidays or special events. These will override the standard weekly hours if times are set, or apply price adjustments using default day hours.
specialDate.statusUpdateError: Failed to update special date status.
specialDate.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this special date? This action cannot be undone.
specialDate.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., Closed for holiday, Extended hours for event
specialDate.activeDescription: If active, these hours/settings will apply on this date.
specialDate.isClosedDescription: If marked as closed, specific start/end times will be ignored and the day will be unavailable.

errors.nameMinLength: Event name must be at least 2 characters.
errors.startTimeRequiredIfEnd: Start time is required if end time is set.
errors.endTimeRequiredIfStart: End time is required if start time is set.
errors.endTimeAfterStart: End time must be after start time.

form.description: Configure the details for this special date. You can set custom hours or mark it as closed.

specialDate.noSpecialDatesYet: You haven't added any special dates yet. Click 'Add Special Date' to create one.
specialDate.noSpecialDatesForMonth: No special dates found for the selected month.
